name: Exhaustion (rebekah.little)
description:
Test your ability to make quick life and death decisions as a microsleeping truck driver.

Exhaustion is an experimental endless-runner developed for Android over 4 weeks. This project was developed in response to a client brief calling for a new perspective or viewpoint. 

Traditional endless runners use either a first person or third person isometric viewpoint, where the difficulty is scaled by the speed of either the player, obstacles or a pursuant. Exhaustion scales the difficulty by increasing the frequency and duration of a blinking effect which increasingly limits the information that can be used to make decisions.
